channel.title: Vps?
channel.description:
Hi, I read the topic - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,474981.0.html before posting. What it didn't tell me on that topic was the specs I needed to have in order to host a lot of players on my server.
There's things like:
[code]Storage Bandwidth Memory Disk Space CPU RAM VSwap CPU Core Uplink[/code]
So what are the main things in the code to look for, that will be able to hold a lot of players? And what else is good to look for in a VPS?

item.title: Vps?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

you could start by telling us how much your budget is

Read full topic

item.title: Vps?
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:17, topic:452134”][quote author=Slimey link=topic=555013.msg4064103#msg4064103 date=1343700166]
Your 100% WRONG! They use the paypal money to support the server and buy advertisements/vps payments/domain payments.

No one spends there money to provide a server like that? You pay let’s say what 10-25 dollars monthly for domain name itself. Then most servers use Vbulletin which cost roughly 300 dollars, look it up. Or IpBoard.

Vps = 20-40 Dollars for a decent one if your hosting a 1k player server like near reality and soulsplit your vps price is going to increase. It’s common sense.
[/quote]
You’re quite ignorant. He wasn’t complaining that the servers accept donations, but rather how a majority of the updates and listed features are for donors. Also here’s a more efficient cost guide that’s typically used more:

Cheap Webhost with domain name: About $10 a month Source: Bluehost
Small Vps with 3GB Ram, 3GHZ Procsesser: About $40 a month Source: Dotblock Hosting
SMF or Nulled VB/IPB Forum system: $0 Source: Simplemachines
Advertisement on Server status page of multiple websites: $0 (Can’t link the source here, surely you can’t find them on your own)
In total: We’re spending about $50 a month or $600 annually to host our server and website, meaning (lets say donator status costs $15) you only need 4 people to donate a month to meet hosting needs, witch is easy even on a really basic system, that’s not to mention if you allow the players to donate for items.

This goes for pretty much anyone else who’s saying “but my serba has a 12 gb vbs thats 24/7 and spends loads of money even tho theres only 20 players online”, it’s unneeded and unnecessary, not to mention probably untrue.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Vps?
item.dc:creator: @Jaxus Jaxus
item.description:
@Jaxus wrote:

It is really hard to determine hosting capabilities based on the amount of players; however, if you are looking forward to hosting a server with a lot of players, you should probably look into dedicated servers.

Read full topic
